description: Up mountains. Down Streets. Decade will keep you covered in all seasons. Versatile warmth that is just as comfortable after a long day up the mountain as it is in airports and rolling through town. Merino Fleece is durable and keeps you super warm, while 100% recycled ripstop panels with eco-friendly DWR water repellency adds extra protection where needed. Zipped pockets will keep your bits and pieces secure while you’re on the move.
name: Mons Royale Decade Pants - Mens

specs.value: Merino Fleece - 59% Polyester 36% Merino Wool 5% Elastane
100% recycled Pertex® Quantum ripstop knee panels shield wind and repel water
